articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: UK's crackdown on illegal immigrant workers hits Indian restaurants - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Home Office described the action against illegal working conditions as a UK-wide blitz on illegal working in the country. | World News
articles.content:
The crackdown in the UK against illegal immigrants has extended to Indian restaurants, nail bars, convenience stores and car washes which employ such individuals.
